name: Al Mateen
description: Al Mateen is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Firm' or 'The Steadfast.' It signifies Allah's power, strength, and unwavering support for His creation.
summary: Al Mateen highlights the strength and reliability of Allah, showcasing that He is a source of firmness in faith and an unyielding support for believers. The name emphasizes that Allah is ever-present and capable of providing strength to those who seek Him.
